text: UX: standardize 5 blank lines between CoPing/CoPong blocks in PS7 transcripts.
UX: Adopt 'CoPong Demark' — 2 blank lines, rainbow rule with label, 2 blank lines. Use: CoPongDemark or alias 'cpd'.
UX: Adopt 'CoPong Demark' — 2 blank lines, rainbow rule with label, 2 blank lines. Use: CoPongDemark or alias 'cpd'.
CoTemp messages: use top-level 'inbox\\*.json' with keys: kind,to,session,tag,ts,summary,details.
